title: Disrupting redox homeostasis for tumor therapy based on PDT/chemo/ferroptosis therapeutic hybrid liposomes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20152-20162
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03361B, Paper

Yuanping Huang, Hongsen Liu, Yanfei Zhao, Haoran Chen, Qiqing Li, Xiaodan Li, Shucheng Hua, Dianbo Cao, Yulei Chang
Synergistic photodynamic therapy (PDT) with other therapeutic modalities can enhance the therapeutic efficacy of tumor treatment and reduce the adverse effects associated with drug leakage and off-target accumulation.
